alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:33PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...GUSTY OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF GILA...COCONINO AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES FROM PRESCOTT TO CORDES TO NEAR PAYSON THROUGH 415 PM MST... At 332 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Clarkdale to near Cherry to Pine. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prescott Valley, Prescott, Dewey-humboldt, Cherry, Prescott Airport, Poland Junction, Cordes, Prescott Gateway Mall, Yavapai Campground, Geronimo Estates, Mayer, Indian Hill West Prescott, Childs Power Plant, Cordes Junction, Cordes Lakes, Groom Creek Subdivision, Walker, Spring Valley, Yavapai County Fairgrounds, and Downtown Prescott. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 257 and 282. State Route 89 between mile markers 304 and 326. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 343. State Route 87 between mile markers 264 and 267. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
